name: Ying He 0001
content: Ying He @NTU Ying He Associate Professor College of Computing and Data Science Nanyang Technological University Office: N4-02a-23 Tel: +65 6514 1008 Email: yhe `at' ntu.edu.sg Research Interests My research interests lie broadly in the area of visual computing, with a particular focus on problems that require geometric analysis and computation. I have applied geometric methods across a wide range of engineering domains, including computer graphics, 3D vision, computer-aided design, wireless sensor networks, and medical imaging. I lead the Digital Geometry Processing and 3D Vision research group at NTU. We are continuously seeking motivated students to join our team. Current NTU students who are interested in exploring 3D Deep Learning, whether through URECA, FYP, or an MSc thesis project, are welcome to approach me.
